metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14846 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: In Ansible, all Ansible Engine versions up to ansible-engine 2.8.5, ansible-engine 2.7.13, ansible-engine 2.6.19, were logging at the DEBUG level which lead to a disclosure of credentials if a plugin used a library that logged credentials at the DEBUG level. This flaw does not affect Ansible modules, as those are executed in a separate process.

criterions.comment: ansible: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
